# 神经网络与深度学习（复旦邱锡鹏）2019.4.6

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-2019-4-6
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-2019-4-6
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-2019-4-6
shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-2019-4-6 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-erlingyijiu-4-6
shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-fudan-qiuxipeng-erlingyijiu-4-6 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
